Qiskit Aqua Documentation

Next topic

Aqua: A Library of Quantum Algorithms

This Page

  • Show Source

Quick search

Qiskit AquaÂ¶

Problems that can benefit from the power of quantum computing have been identified in numerous domains, such as Chemistry, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Optimization and Finance. Quantum computing, however, requires very specialized skills. To address the needs of the vast population of practitioners who want to use and contribute to quantum computing at various levels of the software stack, we have created Aqua: A Library of Quantum Algorithms that can be invoked directly or via domain-specific computational applications: aqua-chemistry, Aqua Artificial Intelligence, Aqua Optimization and Aqua Finance. Finally, Aqua Tutorials is a companion library of notebooks, input files and sample code made available in the form of a GitHub repository.

This part of the documentation will first cover Aqua as a library of quantum applications, and then the domain-specific applications of Aqua: Chemistry, AI and Optimization.
